ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Submitted – Pending Customer Review"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Needs Detail"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Completed – Pending PF Review"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Closed"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Canceled"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(RFI_Item_Status__c),"Cannot Complete")), ISCHANGED(RFI_Item_Status__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( RFI_Item_Status__c , "Submitted – Pending Customer Review"), ISPICKVAL( RFI_Item_Status__c , "Needs Detail"), ISPICKVAL( RFI_Item_Status__c , "Canceled"), ISPICKVAL( RFI_Item_Status__c , "Cannot Complete"), ISPICKVAL( RFI_Item_Status__c , "Closed")), $User.ContactId <> NULL)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer users cannot choose status other than "In progress" and "Completed pending PF review"
